name: AstroBoy and the Blobbians
description:
Welcome AstroBoy!

We need your skills to help save our galactic neighbours the Blobbians. Jump in your ship, land on the enemy planet and bring them home! We know you'll do us proud!

A short narrative focused story for my Michigan State University project. 

This platformer uses sprites, code and music provided by MSU but has been modified. Modifications:

All new story. 3 levels of adventure with progressive difficulty, will you make it home?

New characters, Blobbians, Cyber-Onyx and AstroCat all make an appearance.

Cutscenes, know what to do, when to do it... and why.

New code, you might go in alone but you'll be coming out with friends... hard coded to follow your every move... freaky.

Credits: 

Base code, sprites and music = MSU

Game Design = Daryl Peel

Blobbians = Daryl Peel

AstroCat = Daryl Peel

Level Design = Daryl Peel
